name: Mali Mining and Petroleum Conference and Exhibition
content: The 9th edition of the Mali Mining and Petroleum Conference and Exhibition (JMP 2021) will take place from 16 – 18 November 2021, in the Republic of Mali. The event is organized by the Ministry of Mines, Energy & Water, Mali in association with AME Trade Ltd. JMP is already an established event in the global mining & petroleum industry calendar and one of the biggest events. Under the theme “Adding value to Mali’s mining & petroleum sector through local content and job creation”, the event will feature 2 days of: • Dedicated Conference, which will highlight the geological potential, investment framework and potential business opportunities in the country • Networking events, which will create business contacts in a social environment • Technology and Project Exhibition concurrent to the Conference to allow exploration and production companies as well as service providers to promote their products and services. We look forward to welcoming you to JMP!
